attributes.action: Make wearing masks mandatory when leaving your house.
attributes.additional_details: With coronavirus not looking like it is backing down anytime soon and with cases on the raise with the ease of lockdown I think the government needs to make it mandatory that everyone should wear a mask as soon as they leave their house, if they do not wear one they get fined.
attributes.background: I want the government to make wearing masks outside of your house mandatory to reduce the spread of coronavirus.

rejection.details:
